channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Britain Needs China’s Money. It Fears What Comes With It.
item.description: A botched spying case prompted accusations that the British government was soft on China, highlighting tensions between economic and national security...

item.title: The devil's in the detailing at haunted Halloween car washes
item.description: Haunted car washes have become a national phenomenon, with hundreds of Halloween-themed locations around the country.

item.title: Trump expected to meet with China's president in South Korea
item.description: President Trump will visit Japan Monday before heading to South Korea, where he's expected to meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping.

item.title: Finland's stubbornly low birth rate shows why a population shift may be inevitable
item.description: Famous for baby boxes and expansive pro-family policies, Finland continues to see one of the lowest birth rates in Europe, as a case study in how poli...

item.title: Indiana Governor Calls Special Session to Boost Republicans in Congress
item.description: Indiana is the latest state to consider redrawing its maps at the request of the Trump administration, though it was not clear if Republicans have eno...

item.title: Trump's agenda for Asia trip. And, government shutdown threatens food benefits
item.description: President Trump is expected to meet with China's President Xi Jinping and discuss a trade deal. And, the government shutdown could soon impact food be...

item.title: As New Yorkers Flood Early Voting Sites, Undecideds Become Prized Target
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, the front-runner for mayor of New York City, has built his lead in part by relying on a huge ground-game operation.

item.title: Why public media giants NPR and CPB are fighting in court this week
item.description: NPR is accusing the Corporation for Public Broadcasting in federal court of reneging on a contract to appease the White House.

item.title: Virginia Democrats to Begin Redistricting Votes in Latest Battle for Congress
item.description: State lawmakers are convening to take a vote that would allow redistricting before next year’s midterms, though the process would take months.

item.title: Trump Administration Live Updates: President Meets With Japan’s Emperor in Tokyo
Going Down the Junk Food Rabbit Hole
item.description: Alice Callahan, a reporter for the Well desk, explored the history of ultraprocessed foods and how they became a major threat to our health.

item.title: ICE Detains British Media Commentator Sami Hamdi
item.description: Sami Hamdi, who often speaks against Israel, was in the United States on a speaking tour. The Department of Homeland Security said his visa had been r...

item.title: A New Dynamic in the Trump-Netanyahu Relationship
item.description: Since an Israel-Hamas cease-fire deal came into effect, the U.S. effort to sustain it appears to have constrained Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

item.title: Laurie Metcalf and Other Steppenwolf Members on 50 Years of ‘Freedom Onstage’
